sub_title: Master Data Coordinator | Customer Journey Expert at Kao Corporation
summary:
Sales | SaaS | Negotiation | Business Development and Strategic Marketing | Lead Generation | Innovation | Customer Focus | Cold-Calling I Technical Sales I Operations | Result Oriented | Self-Confidence | CRM/Sales Software | KPI's | Prospecting | 360 Sales Cycle | Direct Sales

Working as a Master Data Coordinator for the EMEA region. Previous experience working as a P2P Specialist, Account Manager, and Sales Manager. Responsible for maintenance of Customer, Vendor, Pricing, Conditions, and Opentext. Making initial presentations, visiting customers, and understanding account requirements to ensure expansion. Skilled in Negotiation, Sales Planning, Territory Management, Prospecting, and Lead Generation.

Strong Sales & Operations professional, with a Master's degree in Strategic Sales Management (USC University, Brazil), Business Management and Innovation in Marketing (B.I. International University, Brazil), and a Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management (Anhembi Morumbi University, Brazil). Fluent in Portuguese, and English and with a great understanding of the Spanish language.

Focus on Consultative selling, to ensure customer needs and requirements are met. Responsible for driving strategic partnerships with local and global companies, developing sales channels, and increasing sales of a wide range of product lines.

Seeking to develop new partner relationships. Aiming to gain experience in technology consultative sales. Creating new opportunities for existing and new customers, tracking project metrics, and identifying trends, and Marketing strategies for the industry. Hands-On Experience, focusing on the desired project result. Easy of working in teams, International Experience, Clear Precise Communicator, Comprehensive, Detail Oriented, and Leadership Skills. Ability to negotiate with clients and partners.

🎯 Goals: Contribute to the sustainable development of a company; Lead Sales activities; Engage stakeholders at all levels inside and outside of the organization and mentor teams.

💪 Areas of Expertise:
► Strategic Prospecting Skills
► Rapport Building on the Call
► Lead Qualification
► Consultative Selling (Spin Method) 
► Objection Handling

EU Visa | Right to live and work | Able to relocate 

Do not hesitate to contact me:
☎ Phone: +31 6 2724 0226
💬 Whatsapp: +31 6 2724 0226
✉ Email: brufelipini@yahoo.com.br
📍 Location: Almere - The Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
• Maintain Customer, Vendor, Pricing, Conditions and Opentext. 
• Maintain data integrity, security, and ensure Vendor’s policy for EMEA.
• Ensuring the proper sorting and organizing of databases for FSSC Kao.
• Take extra security precautions when handling projects, Opentext matrix, and the level approval for EMEA. 
• Transforming data upon request, improving tools and processes.
• Translate data into different language, support business with reports and updates.

Data I Process I Pricing | Security
profile_positions.title: Master Data Coordinator EMEA

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for managing all demand that comes through the Team including a 'hands on' approach, PO’s for Benelux and Nordics countries.
• Performing the business training of the new P2P tool Fiori across the organization.
• Ensure that all processes are as per the agreed governance, guiding and educating the wider teams on the correct
ways of working and making improvements if necessary.
• Raising purchase orders using SAP, working with approvers to ensure PO's are released in a timely manner and within
the agreed timeframes.
• Work with the AP team and Finance to ensure the Purchase order approval matrix is kept up to date.
• Creating accurate maintenance of P2P Team records; produce regular reports on the demand/input through the Team and presenting at meetings

Invoices I P2P I SAP I Operations
profile_positions.title: Purchase to Pay Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Developing and maintaining Melia Hotels database, contributing to new business revenue and international presence. 
• Call leads are derived from lists, referrals, and advertising programs (Inbound and outbound approaches).
• Assisting the sales team to progress the sales cycle, map prospect’s accounts, and create opportunities.
• Follow up with leads who have been contacted in the past, conducting initial qualification of leads based on phone discussion.
• Meeting with Business Development, Sales Manager, and Director of Business Development to discuss Sales Blitz in cities around Brazil.
• Using Salesforce.com to capture information regarding leads as well as improve the result and retain new customers.

Achievements:
Successfully coordinated negotiations with companies such as Panasonic, Mitsui, JP Morgan, Morgan Stanley, Banco do Brasil, Caixa Economica Federal, Banco Itau, Ibope Kantar, Danone, and Embraer.


Result Oriented | Sales Experience | Self-Confidence | Business Strategy
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
• Developing strong relationships with partners, and working with clients to identify new and ongoing requirements.
• Building a robust healthy pipeline through inbound and outbound prospecting to identify the new business in the LATAM market.
• Effectively communicate Accor Hotel's value proposition, while identifying advanced opportunities through the sales cycle.
• Using cold-calling, prospecting email campaigns, and other in-house sales development best practices to develop and qualify prospects and maintain a strong customer base.
• Maintaining metrics to meet weekly targets, such as the number of qualified leads and lead conversion rates. Experience with CRM Dynamics, SalesForce, and Oracle.
• The key point of contact between the company and its customers: answering queries, offering advice, and introducing new products via the SPIN technique.

Achievement:
Recognized for major Corporate Negotiations with companies such as Mitsui, JP Morgan, Morgan Stanley, Embraer, Publicis, Tetra Pak, and Mondelez.

KPI's | Sales | Business Development | 360 Sales Cycle
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Supporting various ongoing expansion projects, conducting and documenting market and business research for Staybridge Suítes São Paulo.
• Expand IHG’s Hotels in Brazil, Increase revenue, and negotiate and manage partner contracts.
• Liaising with various internal teams and stakeholders as needed to carry out projects, promote the company, and create RFI, RFP, and Local Proposals.
• The first point of contact for partners both internal and external, developing joint go-to-market plans.
• Create and adopt new best practices, and manage clients such as Corporate and Travel agencies.
• Working with cross-functional teams to create and execute strategic business plans, practice development, and marketing.

Consultative Sales | Analytical Growth | Sales and Marketing
